General.Name: Mirae Asset No2 Special
General.Description: Kolmar BNH Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of cosmetics, health functional foods, and functional ingredients in South Korea and internationally. It also provides vitamins and minerals, weight control, sports/nutrition, intestinal health, and other products, as well as products for men/women. The company was formerly known as Sun Bio Tech and changed its name to Kolmar BNH Co., Ltd. in 2013. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Sejong, South Korea. Kolmar BNH Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Kolmar Korea Holdings Co., Ltd.

0.Name: Mr. Hwa-Yeong  Jung
